title: OPL Round 4 tipping!
body:
Hey everyone!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Round four of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is fast approaching!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 26th of February.

[Click here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1XRx3FkiW0v0K1QlWQ78MLFIxN2EVhgN1gFwBRimIsAE/viewform) to go to the tipping form

Last week our resident e-sports guy Riot Benji managed to pick 6 matches correctly, with 32 summoners beating him out by picking 7 matches correct! This week anyone that can pick **7 matches** correctly will get the **10 win IP boost** (I sense some close matches this round so I'm going to make it a bit easier on you)

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Thursday 26th of Feb at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with what you picked and why!

replies.body: I'm not on this server but I'll be tuning in for some of the matches figured i might as well do some Tipping :)

>  Riot Benji managed to pick all 6 matches correctly, with 32 summoners beating him out by picking 7 matches correct!

Hey uh that sentence seems to contradict it's self.

Pretty excited this week because of the really close games.
Good pick up! took out the "all" =P
